overview: In this feature film directed by Gazzman, a group of girls arrive at a Venice hotel but find that they donÂ´t have any money, so of course they pay for their rooms with sex! One girl searches for a rich, older, sugar daddy and then finds out that he is actually the owner of the hotel. Another is the girlfriend of the owner, who decides to have sex with his friend. This Private Gold title stars Russian beauty Ashley (aka Irina Bruni), Emma, Emy Russo, Lucy, and Italian bombshell Valentina Nappi. Watch them work hard for their money!
title: Sexy, Horny and Homeless
